ingredients.ingredient: salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Slice potatoes lengthwise to maximize grilling surface and reduce cooking time
Brush oil generously to prevent sticking and promote even browning
Grill over medium heat for 8-10 minutes per side until golden and tender
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain how to properly prepare potato slices and monitor grill heat for perfect caramelization.
